verses.verse: And they took their journey <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Elim <S%H362><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin <S%H5512><s%>, which is between Elim <S%H362><s%> and Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> after their departing out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>:

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Would to 'Elohim <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> we had died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, when we sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by the flesh <S%H1320><s%> pots <S%H5518><s%>, and when we did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7648><s%>; for ye have brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> into this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, to kill <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> this whole assembly <S%H6951><s%> with hunger <S%H7458><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Behold, I will rain <S%H4305><s%> <S%H8688><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for you; and the people <S%H5971><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and gather <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a certain rate <S%H1697><s%> every day <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%>, that I may prove <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, whether they will walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in my Torah <S%H8451><s%>, or no.

And it shall come to pass, that on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they shall prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8689><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> they bring in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; and it shall be twice <S%H4932><s%> as much as they gather <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8799><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, At even <S%H6153><s%>, then ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

And in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, then ye shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for that he heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and what are we <S%H5168><s%>, that ye murmur <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against us?

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, This shall be, when the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> you in the evening <S%H6153><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; for that the YY <S%H3068><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> which ye murmur <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8688><s%> against him: and what are we <S%H5168><s%>? your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> are not against us, but against the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8798><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for he hath heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%>.

And it came to pass, as Aharon <S%H175><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that they looked <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> toward the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and, behold, the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, At even <S%H996><s%> <S%H6153><s%> ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> ye shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with bread <S%H3899><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And it came to pass, that at even <S%H6153><s%> the quails <S%H7958><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>: and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> lay <S%H7902><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>.

And when the dew <S%H2919><s%> that lay <S%H7902><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, behold, upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> there lay a small <S%H1851><s%> round thing <S%H2636><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, as small <S%H1851><s%> as the hoar frost <S%H3713><s%> on the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, It is manna <S%H4478><s%>: for they wist <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not what it was. And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, This is the bread <S%H3899><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you to eat <S%H402><s%>.

This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, Gater <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of it every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating <S%H400><s%>, an omer <S%H6016><s%> for every man <S%H1538><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of your persons <S%H5315><s%>; take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye every man <S%H376><s%> for them which are in his tents <S%H168><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so, and gathered <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, some more <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, some less <S%H4591><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

And when they did mete <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with an omer <S%H6016><s%>, he that gathered much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8688><s%> had nothing over <S%H5736><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and he that gathered little <S%H4591><s%> <S%H8688><s%> had no lack <S%H2637><s%> <S%H8689><s%>; they gathered <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8804><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating <S%H400><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let no man <S%H376><s%> leave <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of it till the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

Notwithstanding they hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>; but some <S%H582><s%> of them left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and it bred <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8799><s%> worms <S%H8438><s%>, and stank <S%H887><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with them.

And they gathered <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it every morning <S%H1242><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating <S%H400><s%>: and when the sun <S%H8121><s%> waxed hot <S%H2552><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, it melted <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

And it came to pass, that on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they gathered <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8804><s%> twice <S%H4932><s%> as much bread <S%H3899><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> omers <S%H6016><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> man: and all the rulers <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, This is that which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, To morrow <S%H4279><s%> is the rest <S%H7677><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: bake <S%H644><s%> <S%H8798><s%> that which ye will bake <S%H644><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to day, and seethe <S%H1310><s%> <S%H8761><s%> that ye will seethe <S%H1310><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; and that which <S%H3605><s%> remaineth over <S%H5736><s%> <S%H8802><s%> lay up <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8685><s%> for you to be kept <S%H4931><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

And they laid it up <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> till the morning <S%H1242><s%>, as Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> bade <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>: and it did not stink <S%H887><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, neither was there any worm <S%H7415><s%> therein.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%> that to day <S%H3117><s%>; for to day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: to day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall not find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it in the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ye shall gather <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it; but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, which is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, in it there shall be none.

And it came to pass, that there went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> some of the people <S%H5971><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> for to gather <S%H3950><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and they found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> none.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, How long refuse <S%H3985><s%> <S%H8765><s%> ye to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> and my Torahs <S%H8451><s%> ?

See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, for that the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, therefore he giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of two days <S%H3117><s%>; abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye every man <S%H376><s%> in his place, let no man <S%H376><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.
So the people <S%H5971><s%> rested <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof Manna <S%H4478><s%>: and it was like coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, white <S%H3836><s%>; and the taste <S%H2940><s%> of it was like wafers <S%H6838><s%> made with honey <S%H1706><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> commandeth <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, Fill <S%H4393><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> of it to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for your generations <S%H1755><s%>; that they may see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> wherewith I have fed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, when I brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> a <S%H259><s%> pot <S%H6803><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> full <S%H4393><s%> of manna <S%H4478><s%> therein, and lay it up <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8685><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

As the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so Aharon <S%H175><s%> laid it up <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Testimony <S%H5715><s%>, to be kept <S%H4931><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, until they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> inhabited <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; they did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%>, until they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the borders <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.
Now an omer <S%H6016><s%> is the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%>.
